description: [KV Botnet Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0035) command and control activity includes transmission of an RSA public key in communication from the server, but this is followed by subsequent negotiation stages that represent a form of handshake similar to TLS negotiation.(Citation: Lumen KVBotnet 2023)

external_references.description: Black Lotus Labs. (2023, December 13). Routers Roasting On An Open Firewall: The KV-Botnet Investigation. Retrieved June 10, 2024.
